entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH ENDED, Blind River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:26 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain or drizzle near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain or drizzle early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with rain. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon then increasing to 40 gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain. Windy. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
